Name: ENGAGE
About the game: ENGAGE | Virtual Communications Made Real. What is ENGAGE? ENGAGE is an advanced virtual communications platform that makes it easy to collaborate in VR. Ideal for conferences, education, simulated training, and virtual events and can be used globally as an alternative to video-based communications. We live in a digital age, which means that geographic locations don’t need to be a barrier anymore! What can I do in ENGAGE? The platform has a wide range of features to communicate teach and learn. Host live VR Meetings, Events and Training – Collaborate live with people from all over the world as if they were there in the room with you. Stream your Presentations, Videos & 360 videos – Bring your existing media and documents into VR to share with others across the world. ENGAGE supports many cloud sharing and media streaming platforms including Google Drive, One Drive, Dropbox, YouTube to name a few. Record & Playback Meetings, Training, Events & Experiences – Record everything inside your sessions, including your own voice, your character movement, presentations, videos, other people, your hand movements, acting, questions, answers, interviews, tests and quizzes. These recordings can be saved and played back to others afterwards, saving you time and money. Create Training & VR Experiences in Minutes – Anyone can create training or virtual reality experiences in minutes using the easy-to-use recording tools and content creation editor in ENGAGE. Avatar Creator – Create lifelike VR avatars in minutes using our advanced avatar creator. Upload a profile picture and we will recreate your face in VR automatically. Outfits & Uniforms – Select from a variety of uniforms and suitable attire for your meetings, events & training. Options available include business attire, smart casual attire, medical practitioners, police uniforms, commercial airline staff, and many more. Forms, Tests & Quizzes – Create simple tests, feedback forms, and quizzes for others and deliver them in VR during your live sessions, training and events. Measure their learning success and learn from your event attendees. What content is available in ENGAGE? The platform has a wide variety of content to use: IFX library – There are 1000+ 3D models, special effects and audio effects available inside ENGAGE to enhance your meetings, training and VR experiences. Virtual Locations – Conduct training, meetings, and events in a broad range of locations such as conference halls, lecture halls, and even on Mars! Experiences, Activities & Lessons – A wide variety of VR content including interactive medical training, classroom activities, lectures, 360 videos from around the world, covering topics such as medicine, science and by content creators such as Oxford University and Neil De Grasse Tyson.
